description: IBMPowerVSMachineTemplate is the Schema for the ibmpowervsmachinetemplates API.

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object. Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and may reject unrecognized values. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents. Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to. Cannot be updated. In CamelCase. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

spec.description: IBMPowerVSMachineTemplateSpec defines the desired state of IBMPowerVSMachineTemplate.
IBMPowerVSMachineSpec defines the desired state of IBMPowerVSMachine.

image.description: Image is the reference to the Image from which to create the machine instance.

memory.description: Memory is Amount of memory allocated (in GB)

network.description: Network is the reference to the Network to use for this instance.

procType.description: ProcType is the processor type, e.g: dedicated, shared, capped

processors.description: Processors is Number of processors allocated.

providerID.description: ProviderID is the unique identifier as specified by the cloud provider.

serviceInstanceID.description: ServiceInstanceID is the id of the power cloud instance where the vsi instance will get deployed.

sshKey.description: SSHKey is the name of the SSH key pair provided to the vsi for authenticating users.

sysType.description: SysType is the System type used to host the vsi.

status.description: IBMPowerVSMachineTemplateStatus defines the observed state of IBMPowerVSMachineTemplate.
